message: Reading comics on the iPhone is surprisingly good, but I'm blown away by how good it is on the iPad. This device was made for comic books. The best app I've used so far is ComicZeal. It's pricey but well worth it. Here's a promo code for one lucky person  FKXMK4WPH99M
To bad I just bought it. This is the best comic app though you can load your own cbr and cbz files.
@Closey Yes it is, and I love how well it handles cbr files.
For people who want to try reading some comics without paying. ComicFlow is very good and it's free.
@marle you're welcome. Did you use the code?
